message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it'll be worth more than that to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the suggestion, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I'm interested in purchasing the product for $10,000.

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with a counteroffer.  While $10,000 is lower than I'm hoping for, I'm willing to meet you halfway.  I'm prepared to sell the product for $11,500.  This reflects the value of the product and allows us both to walk away satisfied.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose an offer of $11,000.
